root.name: Gridders
root.description: Gridders is a puzzle game inwhich the player moves on a 3d grid to avoid cubes rolling from multiple directions. The storyline revolves around a nefarious corporation that replaces it's workers with robots. You play as Zach, the last worker to get laid off. The game begins with you receiving your last paycheck. Attached is a note from Sandra: "Help, I'm in the basement", thus begins the Gridders adventure.
